issue.title: leboncoin.fr
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://leboncoin.fr](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fleboncoin.fr) ### Comment > Hi, > Lately (it's been a couple weeks already, it seems that adguard doesn't block much within the apps on my Pixel 7A. > > It works flawlessly on chrome (except for the "sponsored" links that won't disappear. > But with the apps, it's not quite the same. > > I'm not going to name all of the apps I'm using, but here are a few that are flooded with ads lately: citymapper, booking, sncf-connect (french railway company), Grindr, aliexpress, Amazon, prime video, leboncoin (french eBay)... > > I didn't do anything special nor change settings. > > Any help is more than welcome! Username: `@Janet-x` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/d18ostki9p4ck4so8ogsggo04gc8wwoa1wt452ovz4.png?nc=1)

issue.body:
